content.question: Waterways such as canals and rivers were important in the process of early industrialization because they provided

choices.label: cheap electrical power needed for industrial production
access to leisure activities for the growing middle class
a source for improved sanitation for the rapidly urbanizing population centers
a means for integrating economic activities in regional and national markets

content.answer: a means for integrating economic activities in regional and national markets

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
